name: Increment
description:
Increment is an experimental, incremental, experiential, industrial adventure. Inspired by the classic gameplay of clicker and idle games, Increment flips the genre on its head with an active, kinetic incremental experience. Push buttons, pull levers, and operate weird machines through trippy VR spaces on a journey to make numbers get bigger. Is increasing the only thing that matters?

You have never pressed a button in virtual reality like this before.

Active Incremental Gameplay Use your body to make numbers go in the only direction that matters, up! Increment is an active, kinetic VR experience.


Tiny Motions, Big Results Human-sized terminals control giant machines that leverage VR’s sense of scale and wonder.


All Ages Fun For Everyone Increment Is A Non-violent Game With No Dialog.
